name: Mummification in VR
tagline: Experience Time Travel To The 2600 B.C Egyptian Mummification Era
body:
**Description**
This virtual reality experience leverages the telepresence and takes the user back to about 2600 B.C, and lets user be a part of the Egyptian mummification process. This immersive VR experience can be deployed to Google Cardboard or Oculus Rift. It is developed using Unity 3D Gaming Engine. This project is being developed as a class project for the Virtual Reality (CIS6930) class at University of Florida.

# # Egyptian Mummification VR Experience 

This is a project for Virtual Reality (Spring 2016) class at University of Florida.
The team consists of 3 graduate students:

1. Izhar Shaikh (https://github.com/its-izhar)

2. Sayak Biswas (https://github.com/sayakbiswas)

3. Spandana Gangisetty (https://github.com/spandananitdgp)

# References
1. Egypt Thomb Asset From Krzysztof J.
https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/36586

2. Medieval Props Pack
https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/41540
